description: This file defines the NoteService class, which contains business logic for managing notes, including creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes.

classes.name: NoteService
classes.description: A Spring Service class providing methods for CRUD operations on notes within the application.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new Note from the provided request and saves it to the repository.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Retrieves all notes from the repository.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Fetches a Note by its UUID, throws NotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note's title and content based on its UUID, sets updated timestamp.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a Note by its UUID, throws NotFoundException if the note does not exist.
